channel.title: [Shard] Level Requirements [Shard]
channel.description:
There are no level requirements for items, but there are bonuses and they go in the right slots ect.
Not sure how I would add these, I'ved looked everywhere but there are no tutorials whatsoever on how to add them.

item.title: [Shard] Level Requirements [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Find a file, or a folder, that handles requirements for other things instead of items. Then use that, and create your own requirements.

Read full topic
